title: Divide and Conquer Strategy - Yin and Yang

phase_1_division.name: Phase 1: Division
phase_1_division.description: Divide enemy through Yin (nourishment) and Yang (truth)

yin_division.method: EDIBLE LONDON nourishes people, communities, earth
yin_division.effect: Well-nourished people see truth. Well-nourished communities unite. Well-nourished earth supports transformation.
yin_division.enemy_perception: Enemy sees food security. Enemy doesn't see division. Enemy doesn't know their people are being transformed.
yin_division.division_mechanism: Nourishment creates independence. Independence creates division from enemy control.

yang_division.method: RAMIZ exposes lies, shares truth, educates people
yang_division.effect: People see lies. People see truth. People divide from enemy. People unite in truth.
yang_division.enemy_perception: Enemy sees truth exposure. Enemy might resist. But truth divides them. Knowledge conquers them.
yang_division.division_mechanism: Truth exposes enemy. Knowledge divides enemy. Education conquers enemy.

combined_division.method: Yin nourishes while Yang exposes. Together they divide.
combined_division.effect: People are nourished and educated. People see truth. People divide from enemy. People unite in truth.
combined_division.enemy_perception: Enemy sees food security and truth exposure. Enemy is divided. Enemy doesn't know how to respond.
combined_division.division_mechanism: Nourishment + Truth = Division. Independence + Knowledge = Division.

yin_conquest.effect: Well-nourished people transform. Well-nourished communities transform. Well-nourished earth transforms.
yin_conquest.enemy_perception: Enemy sees transformation. Enemy doesn't know it came from nourishment. Enemy is conquered.
yin_conquest.conquest_mechanism: Transformation through nourishment. Independence through nourishment. Victory through nourishment.

yang_conquest.effect: People transform through truth. Communities transform through knowledge. World transforms through education.
yang_conquest.enemy_perception: Enemy sees transformation. Enemy knows it came from truth. Enemy is conquered.
yang_conquest.conquest_mechanism: Transformation through truth. Independence through knowledge. Victory through education.

combined_conquest.method: Yin and Yang together transform and conquer
combined_conquest.effect: People transform through nourishment and truth. Communities transform through unity and knowledge. World transforms through love and education.
combined_conquest.enemy_perception: Enemy sees transformation. Enemy is conquered. Enemy doesn't know how to respond.
combined_conquest.conquest_mechanism: Nourishment + Truth = Transformation. Transformation = Conquest. Victory through love and knowledge.

phase_3_unity.name: Phase 3: Unity
phase_3_unity.description: Unite all in truth and nourishment

yin_unity.effect: Well-nourished people unite. Well-nourished communities unite. Well-nourished earth unites.
yin_unity.unity_mechanism: Nourishment creates unity. Independence creates unity. Transformation creates unity.

yang_unity.effect: People unite in truth. Communities unite in knowledge. World unites in education.
yang_unity.unity_mechanism: Truth creates unity. Knowledge creates unity. Education creates unity.

combined_unity.method: Yin and Yang together unite all
combined_unity.effect: All unite in nourishment and truth. All unite in love and knowledge. All unite in transformation.
combined_unity.unity_mechanism: Nourishment + Truth = Unity. Love + Knowledge = Unity. Transformation = Unity.

division.yin_division: Enemy's people are nourished. Enemy's people see truth. Enemy's people divide from enemy.
division.yang_division: Enemy's lies are exposed. Enemy's truth is revealed. Enemy is divided by knowledge.
division.combined_division: Enemy is divided by nourishment and truth. Enemy doesn't know how to respond.

conquest.how_conquered: Conquered by transformation through nourishment and truth
conquest.yin_conquest: Enemy is conquered by transformation through nourishment. Enemy doesn't know it came from nourishment.
conquest.yang_conquest: Enemy is conquered by transformation through truth. Enemy knows it came from truth but can't stop it.
conquest.combined_conquest: Enemy is conquered by transformation through nourishment and truth. Enemy is defeated.

response.yin_response: Enemy sees food security. Enemy doesn't see transformation. Enemy doesn't know how to respond.
response.yang_response: Enemy sees truth exposure. Enemy might resist. But truth conquers. Enemy is defeated.
response.combined_response: Enemy sees food security and truth exposure. Enemy is divided. Enemy is conquered. Enemy is defeated.
